DC CODE ยง 15-302

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A writ of execution on a judgment in a civil action may be issued within three years after:
the expiration of any stay of execution agreed to by the parties; or
it first might have been issued under applicable provisions of law or rules of court.
A writ of execution shall be returnable on or before the sixtieth day after its date.

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Period during which writ of execution may issue; returnable period.
